  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/113016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/113016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Hrana</string>
            <string language="en">Food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρόφιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alimento</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Preverjanje in utrjevanje znanja o hrani in njenem izvoru je s pomočjo didaktične igre zabavnejše. Učenci razvrščajo hrano glede na njen izvor. Igra bo uporabna dlje, če natisnjene aplikacije plastificiramo!</string>
            <string language="en">Set of images of food that can be used as cards for different games that require the knowledge of food origin.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hrana</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">izvor</string>
            <string language="en">origin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Bilder der Nahrung, die als Karten für 
unterschiedliche Spiele verwendet werden können, die das Wissen von 
Nahrungsmittelursprung benötigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble d'images de nourriture qui peuvent être
utilisées comme cartes pour différents jeux qui exigent la 
connaissance d'origine de nourriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo das imagens do alimento que podem ser usadas
como cartões para os jogos diferentes que requerem o conhecimento da 
origem do alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme delle immagini di alimento che possono 
essere usate come schedi per i giochi differenti che richiedono la 
conoscenza dell'origine dell'alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο εικόνων των τροφίμων που μπορούν να 
χρησιμοποιηθούν ως κάρτες για τα διαφορετικά παιχνίδια που 
απαιτούν τη γνώση προέλευσης τροφίμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de las imágenes del alimento que se 
pueden utilizar como tarjetas para diversos juegos que requieran el 
conocimiento del origen del alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nourriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">origine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">origem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">origine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρόφιμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προέλευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">origen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
